title: Weekly Champ & Skin sales
body: The champs and skins that were supposed to be on sale from today to 9th October haven't gone on sale.

replies.body: Yup, I know!  I've let interested parties know, but it may be a little bit to update today.  I think it hasn't swapped over just yet to give stragglers a last chance for the sale before the swap.  Hang tight!
TY for letting the correct people know and updating us. I wanna get Illaoi ASAP!
